channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hair Gain
channel.desc: Care for your hair from the inside and out with the help of Hair Gain. From supplements to hair masks and combs, this is your complete haircare collection and every product has a story behind it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Estee Lauder
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, this show aims to inspire you in your choice of festive gifts for the special people in your life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: EMU Footwear
channel.desc: Showcase of Australian born, based and owned brand EMU that has passionately produced the world's finest premium sheepskin and Merino wool products for over 20 years.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: QVC Selection
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Pai Skincare
channel.desc: Unlock the secret to glowing skin with Pai Skincare. Delight in certified organic, vegan, cruelty-free products crafted in London for even the most sensitive skin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags with Aimee. Kestenberg
channel.desc: Discover our curated range of designer handbags and carry away premium-quality bags that will take pride of place in your collection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Jewellery
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: ARKIVE Headcare - ?30 and Under
channel.desc: ARKIVE Headcare - ?30 and Under.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Sea Magik
channel.desc: Discover Sea Magik mineral-infused spa skincare made with finest and most potent natural mineral ingredients for maximum effect.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Men's Fashion with Seasalt
channel.desc: Men's Fashion with Seasalt.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good with skinSense
channel.desc: Feel Good with skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Explore stylish fashion with Ruth Langsford and spread the cost in 4, interest-free. Discover classic basics, vibrant prints and effortlessly chic styles. Tune in and transform your look today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Tune in to see Dyson's ground-breaking Supersonic hairdryer and Airwrap styling tool. Discover how quick and quiet drying or styling your hair can be with these intelligent tools.

channel.title: Wellbeing Heroes
channel.desc: Wellbeing Heroes.
